monster.name: Airship (UA)
monster.speed: 9 miles per hour (216 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 13 Hit Points: 300

trait.name: Control: Helm
trait.text: Armor Class: 16 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of its elemental engine, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Airship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Elemental Engine
trait.text: Armor Class: 18 Hit Points: 100; -20 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (air): elemental power, speed 80 ft. If the engine is destroyed, the ship immediately crashes.

action.name: Weapons: Ballistas
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 50 each Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2

monster.name: Galley (UA)
monster.speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 500 (damage threshold 20)

trait.name: Control
trait.text: Helm Armor Class: 16 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Galley can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Sails
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement: Oars
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): oars, speed 30 ft.

action.name: Weapons: Ballistas (4)
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 50 each Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons: Mangonels (2)
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100 each Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons: Ram
action.text: Armor Class: 20 Hit Points: 100 (damage threshold 10) The Galley has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object, and any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if a vehicle crashes into the Galley.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2

monster.name: Keelboat (UA)
monster.speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100 (damage threshold 10)

trait.name: Control: Helm
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Keelboat can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Sails
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 20 damage taken Locomotion (water): sails, speed 25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement: Oars
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): oars, speed 20 ft.

action.name: Weapons: Ballista
action.text:
Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 50 Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.
Keelboats typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 3

monster.name: Longship (UA)

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 300 (damage threshold 15)

trait.name: Control: Helm
trait.text: Armor Class: 16 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Longship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Sails
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement: Oars
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): oars, speed 20 ft.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Rowboat (UA)
monster.speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 11 Hit Points: 50 (damage threshold 0)

trait.name: Movement: Oars
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 25 Locomotion (water): oars, speed 15 ft. Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the Rowboat's speed is 0.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Sailing Ship (UA)
monster.speed: 5 miles per hour (120 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 300 (damage threshold 15)

trait.name: Control: Helm
trait.text: Armor Class: 18 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Sails
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

action.name: Weapons: Ballista
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 50 Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons: Mangonel
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100 Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Warship (UA)
monster.speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Hull
trait.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 500 (damage threshold 20)

trait.name: Control: Helm
trait.text: Armor Class: 18 Hit Points: 50 Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Warship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement: Sails
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement: Oars
trait.text: Armor Class: 12 Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken Locomotion (water): oars, speed 20 ft. with 80 or more rowers, 10 feet with 40 or more rowers, 5 ft. with 20 or more rowers.

action.name: Weapons: Ballistas (2)
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 50 each Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons: Mangonels (2)
action.text: Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100 each Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons: Ram
action.text: Armor Class: 20 Hit Points: 100 (damage threshold 10) The Warship has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if another vessel crashes into the Warship.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 5
